      • Module contents
forecaster.forecaster.Forecaster([person1, …]) A convenience class for building Forecasts based on settings.
forecaster.forecast.Forecast(people, assets, …) A financial forecast spanning multiple years.
forecaster.accounts.Account(owner[, …]) An account storing a Money balance.
forecaster.accounts.RegisteredAccount(owner) An account with a contribution room limit.
forecaster.accounts.Debt(owner[, balance, …]) A debt with a balance and an interest rate.
forecaster.person.Person(initial_year, name, …) Represents a person’s basic information: age and retirement age.
forecaster.ledger.Money([amount, currency]) Extends py-moneyed to support Decimal-like functions.
forecaster.scenario.Scenario(initial_year, …) Describes an economic scenario over the course of the simulation.
forecaster.strategy.ContributionStrategy(…) Determines an annual gross contribution, before reductions.
forecaster.strategy.WithdrawalStrategy(strategy) Determines an annual gross withdrawal.
forecaster.strategy.TransactionStrategy(…) Determines account-specific transactions.
forecaster.strategy.AllocationStrategy(…) Generates an asset allocation for a point in time.
forecaster.strategy.DebtPaymentStrategy(strategy) Determines payments for a group of debts.
forecaster.tax.Tax(tax_brackets[, …]) Determines taxes payable on taxable income.
forecaster.settings.Settings Container for variables used to control application settings.
